name: invoicerr
description: Modern invoicing application for freelancers and small businesses

scripts.dev:backend: wait-on tcp:5432 && cd backend && pnpm dev
scripts.dev:clean: pnpm dev:stop && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && cd backend && rm -rf dist && cd ../frontend && rm -rf dist
scripts.setup: pnpm install && cd backend && pnpm install && pnpm prisma generate && cd ../frontend && pnpm install
scripts.build: cd backend && pnpm build && cd ../frontend && pnpm build
scripts.start: echo 'Use docker compose up for running in production mode'
